Megatron X:

Around the region storms started to build and rumble darkly.  =
The 
sounds would easily obscure the sound of his engines hurtling the 
hea=
vily armored craft forward.  But soon his presense would be readily 
known.=
  His fusion cannon and twin barrelled beam rifle began to slowly 
focus an=
d charge their lethal energies, and for several moments the 
combined light=
 shone brightly against the storming skies.

But the light soon gave way to=
 a near deafening blast.  A column of 
searing energy cut across the sky, d=
irectly over the fortress.  It lit 
the area brightly for nearly one full m=
inute, and when it vanished, the 
craft responsible had arrived.

As it des=
cended to the battle it transformed, and now Megatron X 
surveyed the scene=
 with distain.
